title: Frustration led to satisfaction
text:
I booked via bookings. Com for March 2 but when I got to the hotel they said my reservation was for March 3rd… I am not sure how that glitch happened but I had a screen shot of the confirmation number and date.
 Sadly, the hotel was full so we had to find another hotel but I contacted Bookings.Com and they refunded my money.
  Another satisfied customer:-)

title: Review
text: Nice hotel ,good staff and excellent service

title: Clean and comfortable!
text:
The room was very clean and even smelled good. The beds were very comfortable and allowed us to get the best sleep we’ve had on this trip. The desk clerks were both very friendly and helpful. The only downside was the breakfast, but we were not expecting any more, so no big deal. 

We totally recommend staying here.

title: The Best and my go to booking app.
text: Booking always my go to for Travel.  Their website is easy to navigate, has amazing content to make good booking decision, and the most competitive pricing in the industry.  Whether it’s domestic or international travel booking is my “go to”. Guys you need to follow this site.  Thank you

title: Our first trip to Disneyland
text: My wife and 2 kids booked a hotel near Disneyland. Drove 12 hours to a city I’ve never been to. Go to the front desk and they do not have a room for us. Called booking.com they just helped us search for hotels near by. Offering us places to stay that are double what we expected per night. Spent the rest of the night calling hotels and motels. If you want to have a Christmas vacation style trip try booking.com

title: AeroSuite
text:
The host has excellent communication skills, their prompt responses and effective communication. 
Perfect location close to the airport, clean and secure. 
I highly recommend this place. 
Thank you.

title: Rip off
text:
First, even though I pay the extra fee ($40) up front to have a “flexible ticket” plan, twice (the only 2 times I tried) I have had to pay an additional fee ($75) again when I changed my flight. When I go online and check the prices, it’s different from what they quote on the phone. I believe that’s part of why they don’t allow you to change it online. You HAVE to call in to change flights. 

Second, they can’t take the payment over the phone while you are talking to them. They send you an email with a link (that looks like a spam page) to make the payment, then they will send the confirmation later. 

Third, after making changes to your flight, the app doesn’t update and so you only have the email confirmation with the changes. Seems pretty cheap that they can’t update the changes on the app too. Doesn’t provide confidence. I prefer the other travel apps now instead of this one. 

Fourth, I’ve booked flights and hotel stays, yet, I have no rewards from this app. But if I book more I can reach “Genius Level 2” rewards. Doesn’t seem worthwhile when other apps are providing better benefits.

 I see 5 star reviews on here from people saying how they loved the hotel stay, but that’s not related to this app functionality. The hotel rating is different from this app rating. The hotel may be 5 stars, but this app is 0 stars.

title: RENU  Houston Texas
text: Going through booking.com to find this location, that would accommodate my family, was so easy. When I messaged the property through booking.com with a question, they answered me almost immediately. I do all of my stays through booking.com and earn rewards too. Highly recommend using them for your next stay!

title: Hotels and car rentals
text: Very easy website to use for beginners who need to book car/hotel reservations overseas and find great hotels rates at budget prices. Thank you for making everything so easy to use and helping me stay on budget.

Але самае прыгожае, што я пакахала з першага позірку - гэта была бібліятэка. Яна ўразіла мяне сваім зместам. Калі будзеце тут, то абавязкова надасце ёй час. Яно таго варта, каб адчуць гэтую творчасць.

title: Horrible
text: I had a terrible experience. I booked a room and received confirmation from Booking.com on my app. However, when I arrived at the hotel, the receptionist informed me that there was no reservation under my name. Booking.com charged me for a room that they never actually booked. I will not be using this app again.

title: Anything but booking
text: Buyer beware. I was a top tier member who used this platform very frequently.  I trusted it. But not after the situation that this company just left me in. They conduct bad business by not obtaining the venues policies, which just left me homeless for a night in the streets of TIMES SQUARE! It’s freezing out, I almost just got mugged and I’m afraid for my life. Of the 3 customer service reps I spoke to - who wouldn’t allow me to speak with a supervisor by the way… not only put me in this situation of taking all my funds, they took the funds from the hotel leaving both myself and the hotel moneyless while they rack in all the cancelled reservation funds - this is BAD business! Horrendous customer service - and they claim to be in the customer service industry, you should be ashamed of yourself leaving a ‘valued’ customer in this sort of situation claiming that you’re BOOKING hotel rooms and doing the exact opposite. What ever happened to people treating people like people and not just reading a script and technicalities and policies with which make literal nonsense if you simply had just taken the time to listen to the customer and their situation and done their job and resolved this with no problem. But instead they chose the money road and well guess what you just lost a very valued top tier gold member in the process. What a disgrace. How any company can treat a hotel that they have a ‘relationship’ with for business and a so called valued customer. This company is filled with lies and frauds and I won’t nothing to do with it or them moving forward. Shame on you for throwing a paying - a good customer at that - to the streets for a long cold and scared for my life night in horrendous and scary part of the city

title: Good service, interface needs improvement
text:
Booking.com has the best, most transparent service and prices compared to other sites like Agoda. 

The sliding scale price filter is impossible to use on phone or desktop. When you set an upper limit, and then try to adjust the lower limit, the scale zooms out drastically and resets the upper limit. For example, I tried to set the upper limit to $80 a night and then when I moved the lower limit, the upper limit changed to something like $5000 per night, and on that scale the sliders for upper and lower limit are so close together that neither finger nor mouse can select either slider. So the function is basically unusable. Just make it a text input box instead. 

Second, when you try to view the property on the map, it’s not clear where the property is because there are too many icons and none of them are labeled which also renders the map function useless.

title: Works great doing the Camino de Santiago
text:
Walking the Way of St James in winter - many accommodations restaurants etc have yet to open up for the season (after Easter). 

This app is useful for seeing what’s available while walking each day. I can decide how many Km / hours I can walk in the cold/snow conditions and make a reservation for a comfortable welcoming place for each following day. 

Booking’s APP is proving to be a wonderful tool.

text: Hey Booking, your app is easy enough to use, and I like it, but when it comes to tracking down info about my flight that the airline would need, e.g. linking miles post trip, the app is not helpful.  Why hide that critical data, ticket number or airline conformation for, in this case?
